title: Poster font ID, help needed
content:
hey,

I am trying to figure out the two fonts used in this poster. I thought the first was Glypha, but the A and E are different, as well as other small differences. Also, does anyone have an idea what the 'SHOW 2006' font is? I have been trying to find a font like this for a while, but i don't really know what that style of font is called? Bubble or something? Haha, any help would be greatly appreciated.

-josh

[http://www.baster.nl/druk/uploads/2006/07/show2006\_poster.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.baster.nl/druk/uploads/2006/07/show2006_poster.jpg "http://www.baster.nl/druk/uploads/2006/07/show2006\_poster.jpg")
author: wolfattack

comments.content: I think "Fashion by Fashion People" is set in Boton Medium

Thanks!

Do you have any idea of what typeface "Show 2006" is? Or could you recommend a similar font in that style?

[Black Boton Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/black_boton_bold/) is similar but the S is a little more stylized, there's also Baby Teeth by Milton Glaser.

There's also:  
 [Neutrino](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/Neutrino.html)  
 [Deuce Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/DeuceRound.html)  
 [Frank](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/Frank.html)

I have some other links Ill dig through. Maybe I can come up woth more suggestions.

[Black Boton Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/black_boton_bold/)  
 [Frank](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/Frank.html)  
 [Deuce](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/Deuce.html)  
 [Mostra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/mostra_blk_one_two_three/)  
 [Blocks](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/blocks/?sample_text=TOTALLY%20NU%20RAVE&sample_size=36)  
 [Alpha Bloc Sculpture](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/alpha_bloc_sculpture/)  
 [FF Extra](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_extra/)  
 [Unovis](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/unovis_regular_ot/)  
 [Neutrino](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/Neutrino.html)  
 [Toch](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/lamosca.com/)  
 [NB Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typografie/3/NBBlock%E2%84%A2/1310/1)  
 [Acton](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/acton/)  
 [Bebit](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?fcode=TM_BBT&letter=B) (Cyrillic version of Milton Glaser's Baby Teeth)  
 [Parkitecture](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/parkitecture/regular/?refby=typographica)  
 [Wagner Silhouette](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/wagner-silhouette-nf/)  
 [Rody](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/rody/?refby=typographica) and [Lazar](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/?refby=typographica)  
 [Cooter](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=NzA=)  
 [Douff](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/2rebels/doufff/)

Free  
 [Spokes](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/down10.com/fonts/spokes.html)  
 [Disco Deck](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=disco_deck)  
 [Pacmania Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/1580)  
 [Fatti Patti](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/d_h.htm) (lame version of Baby Teeth)  
 [Lovers Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Pimp](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTF/Pimp)  
 [FS Pele](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontsmith.com/fonts.php?font_num=675)

Custom  
 [Non-Format](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.non-format.com/) created a bunch of these for their design work.

Soft and Round  
 [Deuce Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neutura.org/DeuceRound.html)  
 [Copal](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/copal_std_ot/)  
 [NB Rund](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typography/3/NBFett%E2%84%A2/1044/1)  
 [Umma Gommma](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Gusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/gusto/)  
 [Fatty](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=MTIw)  
 [Milford](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/handel_sans_bold_oblique/?refby=typographica)

Other Variations  
 [Sinaloa](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053111/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/sinaloa/)
Damn, thanks a bunch!!! I appreciate how fast everyone seems to reply back on this forum.
FS Pele is just what i am looking for, but man, it's so expensive for someone in the US.
